name: Gaming
caption:
In my spare time, I love playing mobile games like CODM 
 We can play some time. Here's my IGN: Saint

name: Korean Series
caption: Also, I love watching korean series. Started with Vincenzo then squid game and watched many others. There's just something korean movies have to offer.

name: Anime
caption: And then anime, I am so in love with animes. Not all though, just animes without fillers and unnecessary contents. AOT's my favorite.
